#labels Featured
RDV runs on all platforms supported by [http://www.java.com/ Java]. RDV binaries can be downloaded for Windows, Mac, and Ubuntu/Debian, in addition to a binary zip file. Source code is provided for all releases.

== [http://rdv.googlecode.com/files/RDV%201.9.0%20Setup.exe Windows] ==
Version 1.9, Released July 18, 2008, Windows Installer, 4 MB

*Requirements*: Windows 2000, XP or Vista, and [http://www.java.com/getjava/ Java 5]

== [http://rdv.googlecode.com/files/RDV%201.9.0.dmg Mac OS X] ==
Version 1.9, Released July 18, 2008, Mac OS X Disk Image, 4 MB

*Requirements*: Mac OS X 10.4 or later, and [http://developer.apple.com/java/download/ Java 5] (only needed for Mac OS X 10.4)

== [UbuntuInstall Ubuntu/Debian] ==
Version 1.9, Released July 18, Debian Package, 2008

*Requirements*: [http://www.ubuntu.com/ Ubuntu 8.04] or [http://www.debian.org/ Debian 5.0]

== [http://rdv.googlecode.com/files/rdv-1.9.0.zip Binary] ==
Version 1.9, Released July 18, 2008, Platform Independent Zip File, 4.1 MB

*Requirements*: [http://www.java.com/getjava/ Java 5]

== [http://rdv.googlecode.com/files/rdv-1.9.0-src.zip Source] ==
Version 1.9, Released July 18, 2008, Source Zip File, 4.1 MB

*Requirements*: See [BuildingSourceCode build instructions].
